description: This file provides utility functions for escaping shell commands and arguments to prevent injection and parsing issues. It defines functions to escape meta characters and properly quote arguments, exporting them as part of a module.

methods.name: escapeCommand
methods.description: Escapes meta characters in a shell command string by prefixing them with a caret (^).

methods.name: escapeArgument
methods.description: Quotes and escapes shell argument strings to handle special characters and meta characters safely, with optional double escaping of meta characters.
